titles.title: To prohibit non-emergency take-off and landing at the Fulton County Airport, Brown Field, located in Atlanta, Georgia, when the airport's tower is closed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/9/1997--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to prohibit, by rule, non-emergency take-off and landing at Fulton County Airport, Brown Field, located in Atlanta, Georgia, when its tower is closed.
